title: Bug 16858Preceding space in package compression pattern sometimes ignored
description: (In the following discussion, all patterns were entered without theenclosing quote marks.)The pattern "1 " causes one character of each package name to bedisplayed with a single space separator between them.The pattern " 1 " causes one space to precede the first singlecharacterpackage name and two spaces to appear between each one.Both of the above cases were expected. However, if you set the patttern to" 1" (i.e. space before, but no space after), no spaces are displayed in theresult.
